text: Today, Kensington Palace announced who will walk Meghan Markle down the aisle at the Royal Wedding tomorrow : The honor goes to her future father - in - law Prince Charles, the Prince of Wales. ` ` Ms. Meghan Markle has asked His Royal Highness The Prince of Wales to accompany her down the aisle of the Quire of St. George's Chapel on her Wedding Day,'' Kensington Palace announced in a statement today. ` ` The Prince of Wales is pleased to be able to welcome Ms. Markle to The Royal Family in this way.'' But why Prince Charles? Getty Images Kensington Palace had previously announced that Meghan's father, Thomas Markle, would be walking her down the aisle.
